Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Shu amulet
Description: Amulet representing the god Shu, who has his right knee and foot  bent and his arms raised to support the firmament. He is wearing a false beard and a semispherical skullcap. There is a small transversal hole for suspension at the top.
